title: HTC Smartphone Adds Built-in Wallet for Bitcoin Cash
text:
HTC Smartphone Adds Built-in Wallet for Bitcoin Cash

Cryptocurrency News 2 hours ago (Sep 16, 2019 05:21PM ET)

© Reuters. HTC Smartphone Adds Built-in Wallet for Bitcoin Cash .com announced a partnership with Taiwanese telecommunications manufacturer HTC to support (BCH) on its flagship smartphones. In a press release on Sept. 16, Bitcoin.com announced that it and HTC would begin a long-term partnership wherein the HTC Exodus 1 will provide built-in wallet support for Bitcoin Cash. Continue Reading on Coin Telegraph

HTC Smartphone Adds Built-in Wallet for Bitcoin Cash
description: HTC Smartphone Adds Built-in Wallet for Bitcoin Cash
